title: SOLD - 1909-11 T206 Piedmont Tris Speaker HOF RC (BVG 1.5)

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1909-11 T206 Piedmont Tris Speaker HOF RC (BVG 1.5)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
Good Evening, Collectors:



Up for sale tonight is a nice 1909-11 T206 Piedmont Tris Speaker HOF Rookie Card which has been graded a BVG 1.5 by the strict graders at Beckett Grading Services, an industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $125.00 dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com





[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/TSpeaker.jpg[/IMG]





[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/TSpeakerB.jpg[/IMG]
